```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

load(here("data/od.rda"))

getwd()

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## OD visualization

```{r vis}
p <- 
  od %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = origin, y = dest, fill = n)) +
  geom_tile() +
  scale_x_discrete(name = "Origin airport") +
  scale_y_discrete(name = "Destination airport") +
  scale_fill_continuous(name = "Number of flights")

plotly::ggplotly(p)
```
